bibl.title: Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)

bibl.seg: FANTUZZI Marco, The Stucture of the Hippika in P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 212-224.
P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. xi, 20-xiv, 1 = 71-88 Austin-Bastianini.
